title: GitHub Copilot Wants To Become Your Peer Programmer
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: A conversation with GitHub's CEO Thomas Dohmke and CPO Mario Rodriguez about AI agents and the future of programming.
cntitle: GitHub Copilot 想要成为你的编程伙伴
cndescription: 与 GitHub 首席执行官 Thomas Dohmke 和首席产品官 Mario Rodriguez 之间关于 AI 代理和未来编程的对话。
